Consolidated Balance Sheets	Net Amounts if Right of	Offset had been Applied	Liability Derivatives	Balance Sheet Location	June 30,	2020	December 31,	2019	June 30,	2020	December 31,	2019	Derivatives designated as hedges:	Foreign exchange contracts	Other current liabilities	Level 2	$	1	$	7	$	 	$	 	Foreign exchange contracts	Other non-current liabilities	Level 2	1	16	 	 	Interest rate contracts	Other non-current liabilities	Level 2	14	11	10	10	Derivatives not designated as hedges:	Interest rate contracts	Other current liabilities	Level 2	8	 	6	 	Interest rate contracts	Other non-	current liabilities	Level 2	 	3	 	2	Total Liability Derivatives	$	24	$	37	$	16	$	12	Our foreign exchange, interest rate and investment market price derivatives are largely comprised of over-the-counter derivatives, which are primarily valued using pricing models that rely on market observable inputs such as yield curves, currency exchange rates and investment forward prices; therefore, these derivatives are classified as Level 2. At June 30, 2020 and December 31, 2019 we did not have any derivatives that were classified as Level 1 (valued using quoted prices in active markets for identical assets) or Level 3 (valued using significant unobservable inputs).	39	Table of Contents	UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
